Welcome
to the website of the Township of Brick. We are dedicated to enhancing the quality of life for all residents by providing exceptional public services, fostering community engagement, and ensuring a safe, sustainable, and prosperous environment. We are committed to transparent governance, fiscal responsibility, and innovative solutions to meet the evolving needs of our community.
Learn More
